tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterQualityData (
    station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    pollutant_level FLOAT,
    pollution_source TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pollution_sources (
    source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name STRING,
    source_type STRING,
    location STRING,
    pollution_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE data_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id UUID,
    source_id UUID,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    pollution_type STRING
);

CREATE TABLE water_quality_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    pollutant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    pollutant_level FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Water_Quality_Data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    datetime TIMESTAMP,
    ph_level FLOAT,
    turbidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Pollution_Sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(100),
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Pollution_Impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT,
    datetime TIMESTAMP,
    impact_type VARCHAR(100),
    impact_description TEXT
);
